Package client

Class PentagoClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.PentagoClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameClient, java.lang.Runnable
    public class PentagoClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameClient
    Class that represents a client which can connect to a pentago server by its address and port. Then, using the provided server protocol, send and accept messages. Also, the client is able to play pentago sessions with other clients on the server.
    Author:
    Aliaksei Kouzel
